section.title: Backup
section.screen: pg_dump --compress=9 --file=/backup/mydb.sql.gz mydb
pg_dump -i -h localhost -p 5432 -U user -Fc -c -f "your_db.backup" your_db

section.title: Restore
section.screen: pg_restore -i -h localhost -p 5432 -U user -d your_db -v -c -Fc "your_db.backup"

section.title: import
section.screen: postgres=# \i /home/neo/woodart.backup

section.title: PostgreSQL for windows
section.screen: set PG_HOME="C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\8.1\bin" %PG_HOME%\pg_dump.exe -i -h localhost -p 5432 -U woodart -Fc -c -f "woodart.backup" woodart %PG_HOME%\pg_restore.exe -i -h woodart.8800.org -p 5432 -U woodart -d woodart -v -c -Fc "woodart.backup"

section.title: 大型数据库备份
section.para: split 命令可以将大型文件切成小块以适应文件系统限制的单个文件大小。
分割,每650M为一个文件，试用于光盘备份
section.screen: $ pg_dump dbname | split -b 650m - filename
section.para: 合并，并且恢复到数据库中。
section.screen: $ createdb dbname $ cat filename* | psql dbname
